document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Bee! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">expecting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Yesterday </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Somebody </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">due </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Frogs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">got </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Home </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Week </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">settled, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">work </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mostly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">back </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Clover </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">warm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">thick </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">get </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Letter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Seventeenth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">; </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Reply </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">better, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Your's, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Fly. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Bee! I'm expecting you!
